body: Just saw the new #superhero movie. Honestly, I don’t get the hype. The plot felt all over the place. Anyone else feel the same? #moviereview #superheromovies

comments.body: I actually loved it! I think the chaos of the plot was intentional—it mirrors the character’s journey through confusion and self-discovery.
@86868 That’s an interesting take. Maybe I missed some of the symbolism. I still feel like the pacing was off though.
I agree with @75757. The action scenes were great, but the character development felt rushed. They tried to pack too much into one movie.
@97979 True, the character arcs could’ve used more time. But I think they were setting up for future movies in the series, so I’m willing to give it a pass.
@86868 That’s fair. I’m hoping the next one expands on those arcs more. Still, this one felt like it was just trying to do too much at once.
The special effects were insane, though! That fight scene at the end had me on the edge of my seat.
@65656 I’ll give you that. The visuals were top-notch. Maybe I was too distracted by the plot to fully appreciate the action scenes.
I’m just tired of superhero movies in general. They all follow the same formula—good guy vs bad guy with some big explosions.
@54545 I get that, but I feel like this one tried to break away from the typical formula with more emotional depth.
